text: (ihalokadalli) navu avarige kelavu sangatigalannu nemisiruvevu. Avaru, avara mundiruva hagu hindiruva ellavannu avarige candaganisikoduttare. Avara virud'dha hagu avariginta hinde badukidda jinn hagu manava samudayagala virud'dha (allahana) matu anusthanavagi bittitu. Avaru khandita nasta anubhavisuvavaragiddaru
